name: Mythic Garden
description:
The Web Version of the game may take a while to load, please be patient. About

Mythic Garden is an action-packed and wacky plant watering game!

You are tasked with taking care of the most exotic British garden. From flaming trees to teleporting flowers, you will improve your arsenal of water weaponry. Will you be able to make it to the end?

You will be rushing around delaying the inevitable death of the plants. You will have to try real hard to beat the game in your first try.

Mythic Garden was created for LDJam 50 in 72 hours.

Controls
  • WSAD - (move)
  • Tap E or Left Click - fill water into your tools
  • Hold F or Hold Left Click - to water plants
  • Q - to throw water balloons
  • Right Click - shoot water gun
  • Tab - Show Full Map
  • ESC - pause
Windows Installation Instructions
  1. Download the Zip
  2. Unzip to a folder of your choice
  3. Run the `Mystic Garden.exe`
Soundtrack 🎵

Stream/download “Mythic Garden (Original Game Soundtrack)” on Bandcamp:

  • https://music.retrogradearcade.com/album/mythic-garden-original-game-soundtrack
